description: A basic course for majors in astronomy, in other physical sciences, and in engineering. Fundamental knowledge of the solar system, its formation, stellar structure and evolution including black holes.
name: INTRO ASTROPHYSICS I

values.comments: Students indicated they struggled with this class.  The homework and subject matter was difficult, and many would have liked to apply some of the formulas they studied, not just derive them.  However, Professor Sako was very passionate about the subject and made himself available to those students that struggled.
